title: //h1[contains(concat(' ',normalize-space(@class),' '),' title ')]

body: //div[contains(concat(' ',normalize-space(@class),' '),' primary_block ')]

strip_id_or_class: tab-title
strip_id_or_class: ratingblock

test_url: https://www.julieandrieu.com/le-fromage-dans-tous-ses-etats/1065-papillote-de-feta-comme-a-corfou.html
